title: Is a Casio FX-991EX allowed in the UTU exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every sort of calculator is allowed in UTU , specially 991MS or EX both , if you are in Roorkee Institute of Technology. But you don't have to ask the examiner this, just use and get away with it.
No FX -991Ex is not allowed in UTU exams.. You can use only FX-82MS.. you can also use FX-100MS in case of examiner allowed …As per my knowledge.. Thank you
